recipe.title: Sugar Snap Pea Salad
ingredients: A large pinch of kosher salt
8 oz. sugar snap peas, strings removed, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil, plus more
1 tsp. finely grated lemon zest, plus more
instructions: Whisk buttermilk, yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, and a large pinch of salt in a medium bowl. Toss sugar snap peas, 2 Tbsp. oil, and 1 tsp. lemon zest in another medium bowl; season with salt and pepper.
Pour dressing into a shallow bowl and pile sugar snap peas in the center. Drizzle with more oil, season with more pepper, and top with more lemon zest.
